In England, in the seven days to 30 March, there were 26,597 new confirmed cases (47.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 23 March, there were 31,786 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 16% (5,189 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 04 April is 3,812,188 (6,772.8 cases per 100,000 population).
